snippet: Sepp Blatter, the president of FIFA, soccer’s governing body, said he wanted Michel Morganella, the Swiss player who was expelled from the Olympics for posting a threatening and racist message on Twitter about South Koreans, to be barred from...
abstract: FIFA president Sepp Blatter says Swiss soccer player Michel Morganella, who was expelled from the Olympics for posting a threatening and racist message on Twitter about South Koreans, should be barred from playing.
lead_paragraph: Sepp Blatter, the president of FIFA, soccer’s governing body, said he wanted Michel Morganella, the Swiss player who was expelled from the Olympics for posting a threatening and racist message on Twitter about South Koreans, to be barred from playing.
